channel.title: Private Server
channel.description: I've tried setting up my own, but it never can work. my computer is not right for it. So I was wondering if someone could set up a server and send me the file for the server so I can still be admin, and still code for all the commands and NPC placements. thanks so much in advance.

item.title: Private Server
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Requesting service isn’t allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: Private Server
item.dc:creator: @Andie Andie
item.description:
@Andie wrote:

yea, I’ve read the tuts and for some reason I can’t figure any out.

Read full topic

item.title: Private Server
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“legionkiller99, post:8, topic:339592”]Ok, if you want an easy to code source i’d recommend a delta based one.
But there is also a new source called hyperion. I haven’t tried it myself… but i heard it’s more stable and supports more features than delta or any other source.[/quote]

If you want an easy to code source I would suggest a cleaned Czar source. also if this is a compiler question, you have to ask that in the stickyed topic about compilers. I will also suggest that you go to the tutorial section and read, “How to set up a server”, and also “Tutorial List”, those will help you learn the 317 protocol.

I should also say, you can’t request for people to code, host, buy, sell, anything for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Private Server
item.dc:creator: @legionkiller99 legionkiller99
item.description:
@legionkiller99 wrote:

A hoster will let you use his computer to run the server, and edit it. Although they want to be paid, which isn’t that weird… as they are using electricity.

Any errors coming up when you try to compile??

Read full topic
